refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: aout wterrain kamp, kpch, k_xcenter, k_ycenter, k_xradius, k_yradius, \ itabx, itaby

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: itabx, itaby -- The two tables that define the terrain.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: The output is the result of drawing an ellipse with axes k_xradius and k_yradius centered at (k_xcenter, k_ycenter), and traversing it at frequency kpch.
